channel.title: FIXED DEPARTURES | NORTHEAST INDIA 2022 - 23 season on NORTH BY NORTHEAST JOURNEYS | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in North-East India
channel.description: Recent content in FIXED DEPARTURES | NORTHEAST INDIA 2022 - 23 season on NORTH BY NORTHEAST JOURNEYS | Adventure, Nature and Culture Tours in North-East India

item.title: ZIRO FESTIVAL OF MUSIC 2022: Camping Packages | 4 nights
item.description: ZIRO FESTIVAL OF MUSIC 2022: Camping Packages We take you to the Ziro Valley of central Arunachal Pradesh for the Ziro Festival of Music.

item.title: ZIRO FESTIVAL OF MUSIC 2022: A Roadtrip to Central Arunachal Pradesh | 6 Days
item.description: ZIRO FESTIVAL OF MUSIC 2022: A Roadtrip to Central Arunachal Pradesh We take you to the Ziro Valley of central Arunachal Pradesh for the Ziro Festival of Music.

item.title: ZIRO FESTIVAL OF MUSIC AND BEYOND: A Roadtrip to Central Arunachal Pradesh | 11 Days
item.description: ZIRO FESTIVAL OF MUSIC AND BEYOND: A Roadtrip to Central Arunachal Pradesh We take you to Arunachal Pradesh, India’s easternmost state.

item.title: WALKERS TOUR OF MEGHALAYA: Walks in the Clouds | 6 days
item.description: Walking Tour of Meghalaya: Explorations in the ‘Abode of Clouds’ This Walking holiday takes you to beautiful Meghalaya, ‘The Abode of clouds’.

item.title: THE EASTERN ODYSSEY: A Roadtrip to Eastern Arunachal Pradesh | 7 Days
item.description: Chasing India’s first sunrise We take you to far east of India, to the land of the ‘Dawn lit ‘Mountains’.

item.title: HORNBILL CYCLE EXPEDITION: Cycling to Kohima | 10 days
item.description: HORNBILL CYCLE EXPEDITION: Cycling to Kohima This cycle expedition takes you from beautiful Shillong (Meghalaya) to Kohima (Nagaland) via the Dima Hsao and Karbi Anglong districts of Assam.

item.title: THE RAINFOREST TREK: Trekking in Namdapha National Park | 6 Days
item.description: A trek in the worlds northernmost lowland rainforest This trekking holiday takes you to the Namdapha National Park located in eastern Arunachal Pradesh.

item.title: CYCLE TOUR OF EASTERN ARUNACHAL PRADESH: Watershed of the Brahmaputra | 6 days
item.description: Cycle tour of Eastern Arunachal Pradesh This cycle tour of Eastern Arunachal Pradesh (the eastern most state of India) takes you to the watershed of the mighty Brahmaputra River.
